message: Let's be reasonable, 60-40 is a good starting point.
Inflation is eating our money, let's settle this quickly. I propose a 49/51 split in my favor.
You tried to take advantage of the inflation, but I won't budge. My new offer is 61-39.
Alice, we're losing money with every round. This offer is barely above my last, let's be pragmatic.
I see you're getting desperate, but I'm patient. My new offer is 62-38. Take it before it's too late.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous. My offer is now lower than yours was in round 3! Accept this deal and let's end this game before we both lose out even more.
You're right, this is getting ridiculous... for you. My offer is now 63-37. You should have taken one of my earlier deals.
